response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and potentially increase your revenue by optimizing efficiency and productivity. Given its high value and unique features, I propose an exclusive offer for you to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings compared to the standard market rate, while ensuring you gain access to cutting-edge technology and unparalleled support. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this opportunity further or if there's any way I can assist you in making an informed decision.", "product_price": 950000}
